themes: integration of environmental stewardship with arts
affordability and accessibility (low entry fee, public transport, bike routes)
zero waste and sustainability practices at events
community-based and educational programming (food growing, composting)
leave no trace and reduction of single-use merchandise
key_phrases: Indoor, climate controlled fine art, museum quality
Creek and lake cleanup incorporated with music, art, and food
Events targeted on growing our own food, composting
climate controlled, low entry fee, public transportation ease, bicycle routes
Zero waste as a goal, #1 refuse (disallow merch like stickers and bags and pens)
barriers_identified: difficulty accessing events via public transportation or bicycle
lack of free water at events
solutions_proposed: host more indoor, climate-controlled fine art and music events
incorporate environmental cleanups with cultural programming
develop events focused on food growing and composting
ensure events are affordable and accessible by public transport and bike
provide free water (with BYO drinking vessel)
implement mandatory leave no trace and zero waste policies
disallow single-use merchandise like stickers, bags, and pens
promote reuse, recycling, reducing, and composting at events
